txt.en: Defeat bats and destroy their perches at Búshatap
Búshatap can be found in Máttugard.\n\nYou should defeat bats and destroy their perches at Búshatap.
Defeated bats and destroyed their perches at Búshatap.

Búshatap, one of the last bat enclaves in Máttugard, is now a training ground for goblin bat-riders. Breeding is done here as well to selectively produce the largest bats for riding. Destroying the bat perches present at Búshatap should assist in culling the great numbers of these winged beasts in Máttugard.
Búshatap remains one of the last bat enclaves in Máttugard and is used as a training ground for goblin bat-riders.
Búshatap can be found in Máttugard.\n\nYou should defeat bats and destroy their perches at Búshatap.
With many bats defeated and their perches destroyed at Búshatap, you have done much to assure the safety of all those who enter through the Noble Gate into Máttugard to reclaim Gundabad.
